title: Capt. Johnstons last farewell who was arraigned for being assisting in the stealing a young heiress, for which he received sentance of death, and was accordingly executed at Tyburn, the 23d. of this instant December, 1690. To the tune of Russel's farewel. Licensed according to order.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Charles Bates, at the Bible and Sun in Pye-Corner,
